lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. On January 31, 2016 our dear Mother and Momma Gail moved from our earthly hugs and kisses to becoming our everlasting guiding light. Shine bright beloved Mom. Adoringly, Evan Adam, Regina (nee Teplitsky), Esme Jemma and Theodore Mason Lowe Haymes 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MAIDMAN, GAIL ANN LOWE

snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail Ann Lowe. On January 31, 2016 our dear Mother and Momma Gail moved from our earthly hugs and kisses to becoming our everlasting guiding light. Shine bright beloved Mom. Adoringly, Evan Adam, Regina (nee Teplitsky), Esme Jemma and Theodore Mason Lowe Haymes 1/3
